summary: An email from a BOP executive assistant regarding Jeffrey Epstein's phone log, instructing the recipient to forward the information to the FBI and OIG (Office of the Inspector General). The email was sent on August 10, 2019, shortly after Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: NYM/Exec Assistant—
persons.context: Sender of the email regarding Jeffrey Epstein's phone log, instructing the recipient to forward the information to the FBI and OIG.

events.title: Email Regarding Epstein Phone Log
events.description: An email is sent from a BOP executive assistant regarding Jeffrey Epstein's phone log, with instructions to forward it to the FBI and OIG.

keyFacts: The email concerns Jeffrey Epstein's phone log, indicating it was a subject of interest or evidence.
The email instructs the recipient to forward the phone log information to both the FBI and the Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
The email was sent on August 10, 2019, which was shortly after Epstein's death in federal custody on August 9-10, 2019.
